These are so awesome looking! And so comfy! Great material. Definitely size UP. I am 5’4 165lbs and I usually wear L or 10/12 in pants. I ordered the 2XL and it fit perfectly.

(See attached photos where I have spoons that go under the small pant pockets and a wooden dowel that shows the medium pant pocket is sewn down).

They feel exactly like scrub joggers, which unfortunately is not to my personal texture preference. However, if wearing scrubs doesn't irritate you, this wont concern you. Uncomfortable material aside, the fabric is nice and thick and I'm glad I sized up because they look so cool when they're baggy(and with the aforementioned texture preference, I like that it doesn't cling to my legs). I see a lot of people complaining that they are loud, but I don't really notice it since I have worn/sometimes wear scrub bottoms to work. I love the excess of pockets and they were definitely worth the money.

i love these pants! i wanted pants that have a lot of pocket room and these are it. the zippers zip very smoothly. the zip pockets are the ones right at the normal pant pocket placement by the hips, then there’s pockets further down on the leg that are velcro and the zipper is just decoration. then there’s velcro again on the bum of the pants. these are like windbreaker material, they feel very secure on the waistband and are definitely warm but breathable!

评论概述: Matches pictures. Cheap Material. Came Ripped. NOT $30 worthy.

I had been putting off buy these for a while because I thought they looked really cool and had some extra cash, but it’s not worth it. $30 especially nowadays is a little steep for getting crappy materials. I’ve paid $30 for jeans on Amazon, over Covid, and they still hold up. To be very honest, unless you don’t care about quality and just want the look, I wouldn’t waste your money. I’ve been eyeballing them for a year and I’m really disappointed to receive a damaged item made of bad materials when I really wanted them too. Oh well. I’ll just wear them until they fall apart in less than six months 😂
